tool.name: UnionMultiYearExpandedADSData

param.name: Location of Existing Files
param.displayname: Geodatabase Where Existing Single Causal Agent ADS Files are Located
param.dialogReference: This parameter is by default set to the location where the existing single DCA feature classes have been created. There is no need to change this parameter unless you wish to point to a copy of the single DCA feature classes geodatabase. If this is the case simply navigate to this location and provide that location as the input of this parameter.

param.name: Geodatabse for output files
param.displayname: Geodatabase Where Files Will Be Written
param.dialogReference: Proided the path to a geodatabase where you have write permission. Unioned single ADS causal agent files will be written to this location.

param.name: Year which analysis will begin
param.dialogReference: Select a year in which you would like your analysis to start.

param.name: Year which analysis will end
param.dialogReference: Select a year in which you would like your analysis to end.

param.name: DCA Value
param.dialogReference: Select the DCA value/values you wish to perform your union analysis on.

tool.summary: This toolbox takes Historic ADS data that has been converted to represent one row per DCA causal agent and union these data by causal agent over a user input time period.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: This toolbox takes Historic ADS data that has been converted to represent one row per DCA causal agent and union these data by causal agent over a user input time period.
